greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into distinct Chen primes.
link: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: gf = Times @@ (1 + x^SequencePosition[ PrimeOmega[ Range[terms]], {1, _, 1|2}][[All, 1]]) + O[x]^terms;
program: (PARI) P=1+O(x^1001); forprime(p=2,1e3,if(bigomega(p+2)<3,P*=1+x^p)); Vec(P) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, May 13 2013
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 26 2005
